definition: smelling of fermentation or staleness, the property of being acidic, go sour or spoil
details:
adjective
- smelling of fermentation or staleness
= synonyms: rancid
- showing a brooding ill humor
= synonyms: dark
- inaccurate in pitch
= example: inaccurate in pitch
= synonyms: false
- having a sharp biting taste
- in an unpalatable state
= example: in an unpalatable state
= synonyms: off
- one of the four basic taste sensations
= synonyms: salty
noun
- the property of being acidic
= synonyms: sourness, acidity
- the taste experience when vinegar or lemon juice is taken into the mouth
= synonyms: sourness, tartness
- a cocktail made of a liquor (especially whiskey or gin) mixed with lemon or lime juice and sugar
verb
- go sour or spoil
= example: go sour or spoil
= synonyms: turn
- make sour or more sour
= synonyms: acidify, acetify, acidulate
